    Method parameters in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.hbtop.mode with type arguments of type FieldInfo
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) List<Record>
    RegionModeStrategy.selectModeFieldsAndAddCountField(List<FieldInfo> fieldInfos, List<Record> records, Field countField)
    Form new record list with records formed by only fields provided through fieldInfo and add a count field for each record with value 1 We are doing two operation of selecting and adding new field because of saving some CPU cycles on rebuilding the record again
